author: Alex Evans
description:
Picking through the new DnD Scion Unearthed Arcana playtest class, there are loads of moving parts and build options to consider, and - at first glance - the set of ten Psion-only Wild Talent feats seem like some of the blandest dishes at the buffet. On closer inspection, though, you'll find some of them are going to be a rather tasty magical upgrade to some martial builds - one ice cold option in particular.

Continue reading DnD's new Psion playtest class has plenty of feats - but one is clearly the best
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD's new Psion playtest class has plenty of feats - but one is clearly the best

author: Matt Bassil
description:
By now it’s no secret that Silvally is a very good Pokémon Pocket card. This normal type Pokémon and its archetype managed to dominate tournaments for the first couple weeks of the new set, a first for a non-ex deck.

Continue reading The 5 best builds for Pokémon Pocket's unhinged Silvally deck
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How many Pokémon are there?, How to play Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards
title: The 5 best builds for Pokémon Pocket's unhinged Silvally deck

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Think that you know paint? Really, really know paint? If you do, then Games Workshop might have a job for you. The Warhammer 40k manufacturer has recently opened two job listings, one for a ‘paint, coatings, and adhesives’ product developer, the other for a hobby product tester - hinting that the firm is putting more resources into developing its paint ranges.

Continue reading Do these GW job listings hint a new Warhammer paint range is on the way?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Do these GW job listings hint a new Warhammer paint range is on the way?

author: Chloe Ward
description:
The Lego Star Wars Tenoo Jedi Temple set is currently 40% off on the Lego Store, meaning you can bag it for a droid dropping $23.99. Based on spin-off animated serious Young Jedi Adventures and designed for young Padawans (aged 4 and up), there will be no deploying the garrisons here, just kid friendly, colorful design and lots of playability.

Continue reading This new Star Wars jedi temple Lego set is already 40% off
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Biggest LEGO sets, LEGO sets for adults, Best Star Wars LEGO sets
title: This new Star Wars jedi temple Lego set is already 40% off

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Troubled board game maker CMON has sold the rights to its most successful board game IP, Zombicide, to international publisher and distributor Asmodee. Asmodee announced the deal on the morning of June 10, the first acquisition the firm has made since it became an independent company this April - but not the last it plans to make.

Continue reading Ailing board game giant CMON sells its flagship Zombicide IP to Asmodee
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best horror board games, Board games for adults
title: Ailing board game giant CMON sells its flagship Zombicide IP to Asmodee

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Barbara Wright, an obscure and very rarely used Magic: The Gathering card from the Doctor Who set has shot up in value. It’s more than tripled in price in the past couple weeks, hitting $5. Going back a month, its rise is even more striking, as before Final Fantasy previews began it was valued at just 30 cents, according to MTG Goldfish.

Continue reading Unloved Doctor Who MTG card spikes 1500% thanks to Final Fantasy combo
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Unloved Doctor Who MTG card spikes 1500% thanks to Final Fantasy combo
